docs.lead_paragraph: ON these pages is recorded the progress made by the Hundred Neediest Cases of 1928 in the six months since last December when the appeal to help them was made by THE NEW YORK TIMES.

headline.main: NO MORE ARE THEY THE HUNDRED NEEDIEST; Christmas Fund Given by Readers of the New York Times Has Changed the Lives of Many Families in Distress--The Contrast Of Conditions six Mon the Ago and Now Tells a Story of Increased Happiness and Well-Being For the People Aided.
